rules.name: myRule_13
rules.label: Is the Record Type Fund Internal?

Flow.description: Auto populate the name and set the active flags Change behaviour + combined multiple flows with trunk name workflow

value.stringValue: ( [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'Fund Internal'|| [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'Listed Issuers' || [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'PFG Other Fundraising' || [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'Credit Opportunities' )&& [Investor_Position__c].Is_Active__c = True && $User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c = False

formulas.name: formula_myRule_10
formulas.expression: ( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Fund Internal'|| {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Listed Issuers' || {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'PFG Other Fundraising' || {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Credit Opportunities' )&& {!myVariable_current.Is_Active__c} = True && {!$User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c} = False

value.stringValue: AND( [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Child_PSG_Investor_Positions', $User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c = False , OR ( ISNEW(), NOT( ISNULL([Investor_Position__c].Active__c )), NOT( ISNULL([Investor_Position__c].Investment_Vehicle_Active__c)), NOT( ISNULL( [Investor_Position__c].PSG_active_account__c)), [Investor_Position__c].Is_Active__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED ( [Investor_Position__c].Geneva_Code__c), ISCHANGED( [Investor_Position__c].Investment_Vehicle__c.Name) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_15
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Child_PSG_Investor_Positions', {!$User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c} = False , OR ( ISNEW(), NOT( ISNULL({!myVariable_current.Active__c} )), NOT( ISNULL({!myVariable_current.Investment_Vehicle_Active__c})), NOT( ISNULL( {!myVariable_current.PSG_active_account__c})), {!myVariable_current.Is_Active__c} = TRUE, ISCHANGED ( {!myVariable_current.Geneva_Code__c}), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name}) ) )

value.stringValue: AND( [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Child_PSG_Investor_Positions', $User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c = False , OR ( ISNEW(), NOT( ISNULL([Investor_Position__c].Active__c )), NOT( ISNULL([Investor_Position__c].Investment_Vehicle_Active__c)), NOT( ISNULL( [Investor_Position__c].PSG_active_account__c)), [Investor_Position__c].Is_Active__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED ( [Investor_Position__c].Geneva_Code__c), ISCHANGED( [Investor_Position__c].Investment_Vehicle__c.Name) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_15_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_old.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Child_PSG_Investor_Positions', {!$User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c} = False , OR ( ISNEW(), NOT( ISNULL({!myVariable_old.Active__c} )), NOT( ISNULL({!myVariable_old.Investment_Vehicle_Active__c})), NOT( ISNULL( {!myVariable_old.PSG_active_account__c})), {!myVariable_old.Is_Active__c} = TRUE, ISCHANGED ( {!myVariable_old.Geneva_Code__c}), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_old.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name}) ) )

value.stringValue: ( [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'Fund Internal' || [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'Listed Issuers' || [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'PFG Other Fundraising' || [Investor_Position__c].RecordType.Name = 'Credit Opportunities' )&& [Investor_Position__c].Is_Active__c = False && $User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c = False

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: ( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Fund Internal' || {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Listed Issuers' || {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'PFG Other Fundraising' || {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Credit Opportunities' )&& {!myVariable_current.Is_Active__c} = False && {!$User.MassUpdateByPassCheck__c} = False

Flow.label: Investor Positions Active/Inactive
